Class Submarine

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Battleship
        • Submarine
  • public class Submarine
extends Battleship
    Submarines are Battleship with the special functionality of being able to submerge underwater should the player choose to do so. When submerged underwater, submarines are immune to being hit by aerial Missiles, but are vulnerable to underwater Torpedos. When they are not submerged, they are immune to underwater Torpedos, but vulnerable to aerial Missiles. Submarines have three hitpoints and are 3x1 cells in size.
    Version:
    June 14, 2020
    Author:
    Daniel Wei

      • Submarine

        public Submarine​(int hp,
                 boolean isLeft,
                 BattleWorld bw)
        Create a Submarine with specified hp, player association, and BattleWorld
        Parameters:
        hp - The HP this Submarine will start with.
        isLeft - True if this Submarine belongs to the left side player, false if it belongs to the right side player.
        bw - The BattleWorld this Submarine is in.
